home.title: Schedule Generator for Shops - Planneo
home.subtitle: Free schedule management software for businesses and shops.
home.description: Easily create your team schedules, automatically calculate hours worked, export your schedules as professional PDFs.
home.seoDescription: Planneo is the ideal tool for shops and stores that want to optimize their staff management. Weekly planning, automatic hours calculation, intuitive interface.

features.teamManagement: Team management for shops and stores

home.keywordsDescription: These terms are frequently searched by shops and businesses
home.clickKeyword: Click on a keyword to see current search results

settings.title: Settings
settings.exportExplanation: Download a JSON file with all your data
settings.exportDataDescription: Download all data in JSON format
settings.importExplanation: Load data from an exported JSON file
settings.importDataDescription: Select a JSON file to import

planning.title: Planning
planning.noShopConfiguredDescription: To use intelligent planning generation, you must first create at least one shop.
planning.selectShopDescription: You have {count} shop{plural} configured. Select one from the dropdown above to start generating schedules.
planning.intelligentPlanningDescription: Generation takes into account skills, availability, legal constraints and automatically optimizes your schedule for {shopName}.
planning.clearMonthConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all shifts for the current month? This action is irreversible.
planning.deleteShiftConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this shift?

reports.title: Reports
reports.noDataDescription: No shifts have been recorded for this month.

home.title: Schedule Generator for Shops - Planneo
home.description: Free schedule management software for businesses and shops. Easily create your team schedules, automatically calculate hours worked, export your schedules as professional PDFs.
home.keywords: schedule generator, shop software, team management, commercial planning, employee schedules, PDF planning

planning.title: Planning - Planneo
planning.description: Generate and manage your work schedules with our intelligent tool. Automatic planning, multi-store management, professional PDF export.
planning.keywords: work schedule, automatic generation, schedule management, multi-store, PDF export

reports.title: Reports and Exports - Planneo
reports.description: View your detailed reports and export your schedules as PDFs. Employee statistics, quota tracking, monthly analytics.
reports.keywords: schedule reports, PDF export, employee statistics, hour quotas, monthly analytics

users.title: User Management - Planneo
users.description: Manage your team with our intuitive interface. Add, modify and organize your employees to optimize your schedules.
users.keywords: user management, team, employees, schedule organization, intuitive interface

advanced.title: Advanced Management - Planneo
advanced.description: Advanced tools to optimize your schedules. Holiday management, quota tracking, store configuration.
advanced.keywords: advanced management, holidays, quotas, stores, schedule optimization

settings.title: Settings - Planneo
settings.description: Configure your Planneo application. Language, data export/import, application information.
settings.keywords: settings, configuration, language, data export, data import
